title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI in the Beautiful Game: Data-Driven Success in Football (SPF302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 美丽足球中的生成式AI：足球运动中的数据驱动成功之道 (SPF302)
abstract: Discover how top-tier football clubs are leveraging generative AI to gain a competitive edge. This session explores real-world applications of AI in professional sports, from tactical analysis to talent scouting. Learn how clubs are using AWS's data platform and AI technologies to identify defensive gaps, optimize formations, and uncover rising stars. Hear firsthand accounts of the transformational impact of AI on decision-making and performance both on and off the pitch. Join us to explore the intersection of technology and the beautiful game.
abstract_cn: 探索顶级足球俱乐部如何利用生成式AI获得竞争优势。本次会议探讨AI在职业体育中的实际应用，从战术分析到球探选材。了解俱乐部如何使用AWS的数据平台和AI技术来识别防守漏洞、优化阵型并发掘新星。聆听AI对场上场下决策和表现产生变革性影响的第一手资料。加入我们，探索技术与足球运动的交汇点。
